executiveSummary: Nicholas George and Kevin Mack pitched their product 'TickPick'—a guitar pick with nano-suction grip technology that sticks to guitars—to the Sharks, seeking $75,000 for 10% equity. After demonstrating the product and discussing its features, sales, and backgrounds, Mark Cuban offered $75,000 for 16% equity, which the entrepreneurs accepted.
keyDecisions: Mark Cuban invested $75,000 for 16% equity in TickPick.
nextSteps: The TickPick team will work with Mark Cuban to expand sales, increase retail presence, and scale production and marketing efforts for the product.
